mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (num, memberId, subject, content, isEvent, created) VALUES (#{num}, #{memberId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 1, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM event e JOIN member1 m ON e.memberId=m.memberId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM event e JOIN member1 m ON e.memberId=m.memberId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eventFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (eventFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize FROM eventFile WHERE num=#{num}
SELECT fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize FROM eventFile WHERE fileNum=#{fileNum}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM event e JOIN member1 m ON e.memberId=m.memberId
